00025 #ifndef FILEARCHIVE_FILEARCHIVE_H 
00026 #define FILEARCHIVE_FILEARCHIVE_H
00027 
00028 #if defined(_IOP)
00029 typedef unsigned char uint8_t;
00030 typedef unsigned short uint16_t;
00031 typedef unsigned int uint32_t;
00032 typedef int int32_t;
00033 #else
00034 #include <stdint.h>
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 typedef struct fa_container_t fa_container_t;
00038 typedef struct fa_entry_t fa_entry_t;
00039 typedef struct fa_block_t fa_block_t;
00040 typedef struct fa_header_t fa_header_t;
00041 typedef struct fa_footer_t fa_footer_t;
00042 typedef struct fa_hash_t fa_hash_t;
00043 
00044 typedef uint32_t fa_offset_t;
00045 
00046 typedef enum
00047 {
00048         FA_COMPRESSION_NONE = (0),
00049         FA_COMPRESSION_FASTLZ = (('F' << 24) | ('L' << 16) | ('Z' << 8) | ('0'))
00050 } fa_compression_t;
00051 
00052 typedef enum
00053 {
00054         FA_VERSION_1 = 1,
00055 
00056         FA_VERSION_CURRENT = FA_VERSION_1
00057 } fa_version_t;
00058 
00059 typedef enum
00060 {
00061         FA_MAGIC_COOKIE_HEADER = (('F' << 24)|('A' << 16)|('R' << 8)|('H')),
00062         FA_MAGIC_COOKIE_FOOTER = (('F' << 24)|('A' << 16)|('R' << 8)|('F'))
00063 } fa_magic_cookie_t;
00064 
00065 struct fa_container_t
00066 {
00067         fa_offset_t parent;             // Offset to parent container (Relative to start of TOC)
00068         fa_offset_t children;           // Offset to child containers (Relative to start of TOC)
00069         fa_offset_t next;               // Offset to next sibling container (Relative to start of TOC)
00070 
00071         fa_offset_t name;               // Offset to container name (Relative to start of TOC)
00072 
00073         struct
00074         {
00075                 fa_offset_t offset;     // Offset to first entry in container (Relative to start of TOC)
00076                 uint32_t count;         // Number of entries in container
00077         } entries;
00078 };
00079 
00080 struct fa_entry_t
00081 {
00082         fa_offset_t data;               // Offset to file data (Relative to start of data)
00083         fa_offset_t name;               // Offset to name (Relative to start of TOC)
00084 
00085         uint32_t compression;           // Compression method used in file
00086         uint32_t blockSize;             // Block size required when decompressing
00087 
00088         struct
00089         {
00090                 uint32_t original;      // original file size when uncompressed
00091                 uint32_t compressed;    // compressed file size in archive
00092         } size;
00093 };
00094 
00095 struct fa_block_t
00096 {
00097         uint16_t original;
00098         uint16_t compressed;            // If the highest bit (FILEARCHIVE_COMPRESSION_SIZE_IGNORE) is set, the block is uncompressed
00099 };
00100 
00101 struct fa_hash_t
00102 {
00103         uint8_t data[20];
00104 };
00105 
00106 struct fa_header_t
00107 {
00108         uint32_t cookie;                // Magic cookie
00109         uint32_t version;               // Version of archive
00110         uint32_t size;                  // Size of TOC
00111         uint32_t flags;                 // Flags
00112 
00113         // Version 1
00114 
00115         struct
00116         {
00117                 fa_offset_t offset;     // Offset to containers (relative to start of TOC)
00118                 uint32_t count;         // Number of containers in archive
00119         } containers;
00120 
00121         struct
00122         {
00123                 fa_offset_t offset;     // Offset to entries (relative to start of TOC)
00124                 uint32_t count;         // Number of entries in archive
00125         } entries;
00126 
00127         fa_offset_t hashes;             // Offset to content hashes
00128 };
00129 
00130 struct fa_footer_t
00131 {
00132         uint32_t cookie;                // Magic cookie
00133 
00134         struct
00135         {
00136                 uint32_t compression;   // TOC compression format
00137                 uint32_t original;      // TOC size, uncompressed
00138                 uint32_t compressed;    // TOC size, compressed
00139                 fa_hash_t hash;         // TOC hash
00140         } toc;
00141 
00142         struct
00143         {
00144                 uint32_t original;      // Data size, uncompressed
00145                 uint32_t compressed;    // Data size, compressed
00146         } data;
00147 };
00148 
00149 #define FA_COMPRESSION_SIZE_IGNORE (0x8000)
00150 
00151 #define FA_INVALID_OFFSET (0xffffffff)
00152 
00153 #endif
